name: Adelaide

levels.Ⅰ: :instant: Discard 1 card. Target a space on the Combat board. All [units](../units/index.md) adjacent to this space suffer 1 :damage:.
levels.Ⅳ: :instant: Select 1 [Spell](../spells/index.md) or Specialty card from your discard pile and put it back in your hand.
levels.Ⅵ: :instant: Discard 2 cards. Target a space on the Combat board. All [units](../units/index.md) adjacent to this space suffer 2 :damage:.

notes: **Ⅰ and Ⅵ** - The :damage: from Frost Ring also applies to friendly units.
These specialties can be played as *instant* effects at any time during Combat, not just during the friendly unit activations.
